trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_SEQ_00<tab>Ponnixia has a dirty job, but some one has to do it.

TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_SEQ_01<tab>Malicious sylphs are polluting the Sylphlands with a particularly unpleasant strain of the banestool, bringing considerable harm to the local flora and fauna. Slay two of the foul fungi to stave off further contamination of the forest.
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_SEQ_02<tab>The greater banestools will stink up the Sylphlands no more. Ponnixia will be pleased to hear of your success.

TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_SEQ_03<tab>Ponnixia appreciates your efforts in making the forest a more desirable place for her and her people to reside. She thanks you for your services and urges you to stay close by should she again require your aid.
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab><sigh> Touched ones are making a stink again, planting stink-spores across the Sylphlands.

TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>The stink spreads, trees wither and die, and these ones' forest friends turn sick and angry. If some one does not put a stop to this, the forest will soon be uninhabitable by any one.
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_002<tab>Brave one must slice up stink-spores and save the forest from a foul fate!
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_003<tab>But brave one must be wary! Wherever stink-spores go, planting ones and stink-crazed creatures are sure to follow.
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>Brave one must slice up stink-spores and save the forest from a foul fate!
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_006<tab>But brave one must be wary! Wherever stink-spores go, planting ones and stink-crazed creatures are sure to follow.
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_010<tab>These ones thank you, brave one. Since brave one arrived here, the dark cloud hanging over the Sylphlands has begun to lift, little by little.
TEXT_BANSYL210_01276_PONNIXIA_000_011<tab>...But there is still much work to be done. Pray do not abandon these ones, brave one.
